metadata.title: Travel Neck Wallet (black)
features: Fine quality polyurethane material with good stitching, contains no animal products
6 credit card or business card slots, 4 document pockets
Back exterior slip pocket for your boarding pass or tickets
description: Travel confidently knowing your documents, cards, and currency are organized and safe inside your sleek neck wallet. Interior features designated pockets for two passports as well as six slots for credit card and ID. In addition, there are four full-length pockets and compartments, plus an exterior back slip pocket….. tickets, cash, boarding passes or other documents are easily accessed in airport and elsewhere. Made of black polyurethane with dual snap closures and about 3 feet detachable strap. For men or women.
